fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Perform a Factional Kill for a faction.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role may only spawn in the presence of factions without a factional kill.
- Your Factional Kill will be accredited to a faction in the game that does not have a factional kill. If you attack a member of one of these factions, you will join their chat and your win condition will be changed to theirs.
- Roles that see factional visits (e.g. 62 Spy) will see your visit as a visit of the faction to which your kill is accredited.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose the game.
